name: Mircea Trifan
body:
![Mircea Trifan, PEng](/WIN_20150114_140104.JPG)

### Welcome to My Web Page.

I'm a software engineer at Mgestyk and a PhD student at University of Ottawa under the supervision of Dr. Dan Ionescu.

### Contact

* email: mircea dot trifan at gmail dot com
* phone: +613.562.5800 ext 6236

### Patent

[US Patent US6947547](http://www.patentbuddy.com/Patent/6947547): Management system for a telecommunications switch

### Publications

* "An Architecture and Methods for Big Data Analysis", Bogdan Ionescu, Dan Ionescu, Cristian Gadea, Bogdan Solomon, and Mircea Trifan, SOFA2014 [PDF](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B7jusMALbE7vTTRtZ3Vpb1c5enM&authuser=0)
* "An AI based solution for the control of 3D real-time sensor based gaming.", Dan Ionescu, Shahidul Islam, Cristian Gadea, Bogdan Ionescu, Eric McQuiggan, Mircea Trifan, VECIMS2010
* "A New Search Method for Ranking Short Text Messages Using Semantic Features and Cluster Coherence", Mircea Trifan, Dan Ionescu, ICCC-CONTI 2010 IEEE Conference.
* "Text Mining and Semantic Search with a Predicate Argument Structure Database", Mircea Trifan, Dan Ionescu, Miguel Andrade, Carolina Perez-Iratxeta, BIOCOMP 2009
* "An ontology based approach to intelligent data mining for environmental virtual warehouses of sensor data", M. Trifan, B. Ionescu, D. Ionescu, O. Prostean, G. Prostean, VECIMS2008
* "Using POS Annotations and EMdF Text Modeling for Semantic Web Search" Rodica Diaconescu, Paul Hirschbuhler, Dan Ionescu, France Martineau, Mircea Trifan, 5th International Information and Telecommunication Technologies Symposium I2TS 2006, [PDF](/POS_EMDF.pdf)
* "Federated Name Resolution", M. Trifan, May 1999, Master of Applied Science Thesis University of Ottawa.
* "Distributed Interactive Architecture for Telecommunications Management", M. Trifan and R. Ocica, IEEE Ottawa Network Management Workshop, 1998, Chateau Montebello - awarded best student poster presentation.
* "Architecture for Distributed Instrumentation Environments", V. Groza, D. Ionescu, R. Ocica and M. Trifan IEEE Workshop on Emergent Technologies & Virtual Systems for Instrumentation and Measurement Proceedings, 1997, Niagara Falls.
* "A CORBA Based Multimedia Environment over AAL5", M. Trifan and R. Ocica, TRIO Researcher Retreat Proceedings, 1997, Kingston.
* "The MagNum Program for the Numerical Analysis of the Magnetic Field", M. Trifan, Diploma Engineer Thesis, 1993, Politehnica University of Timisoara, Romania.
